prob140.plots.Plot_beta¶

prob140.plots.Plot_beta(x_limits, a, b, **kwargs)[source]¶

Plots a beta distribution.

Parameters:
x_limits : iterable

Array, list, or tuple of size 2, containing the lower and upper bound to be plotted.

a : float

Shape.

b : float

Shape.
Returns:
None
